summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of First Avenue South from the north margin of Holgate Street to the north margin of Atlantic Street in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer under Ordinance No. 18685, creating Local Improvement District No. 1786 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
